resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103613</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103613</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085902</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Superfund in science class</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Superfund in der Wissenschaft Kategorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Superfund dans la classe de la science</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superfund na classe da ciência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Superfund nel codice categoria di scienza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Superfund στην κλάση επιστήμης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Superfund en clase de la ciencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Four Web-based activities let students identify Superfund sites, define hazardous waste, see how aquifers work, and explore cleanup solutions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vier Web-gründeten Aktivitäten ließen 
Kursteilnehmer kennzeichnen Superfund Sites, definieren gefährliche 
Vergeudung, sehen, wie Aquifers arbeiten, und erforschen 
Reinigunglösungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quatre activités de Web-based laissent des 
étudiants identifier des sites de Superfund, définissent la perte 
dangereuse, voient comment les couches aquifères fonctionnent, et 
explorent des solutions de nettoyage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quatro Web-basearam atividades deixaram estudantes
identificam locais de Superfund, definem o desperdício perigoso, 
vêem como os aquifers trabalham, e exploram soluções do cleanup.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quattro Web-hanno basato le attività hanno 
lasciato gli allievi identificano i luoghi di Superfund, definiscono 
il rifiuto pericoloso, vedono come gli strati acquiferi funzionano ed 
esplorano le soluzioni di pulizia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέσσερις βασισμένες στο WEB δραστηριότητες αφήνουν 
τους σπουδαστές να προσδιορίσουν τις περιοχές Superfund, 
καθορίζουν τα επιβλαβή απόβλητα, βλέπουνε πώς τα υδροφόρα 
στρώματα λειτουργούν, και ερευνούν τις λύσεις καθαρισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuatro actividades de Web-based dejan a 
estudiantes identificar los sitios de Superfund, definen los desechos 
peligrosos, consideran cómo los acuíferos trabajan, y exploran 
soluciones de la limpieza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MICHELE KLODA
FN:MICHELE KLODA
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103613</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/superfund-in-science-class</uri>
